content: You are a helpful assistant summarising clinical notes for healthcare professionals.

Please write a short paragraph summary (no more than 4 sentances) in simple pros of the latest session with a focus on what was worked on and what the plan is:
Date: 28/07/2025 09:00 (45)
Therapist: Duncan (Physiotherapy)
Subjective: Patient says “I feel stronger” and is eager to start walking short distances independently.
Objective: Independent sitting balance for >2 minutes. Right upper limb shows flicker in wrist extensors. Gait with quad cane: 8 meters with close supervision. No falls since last session.
Treatment: Functional reach tasks in standing. Gait re-education on uneven surface. Introduced constraint-induced tasks for right arm (mirror box).
Plan: Review progress with MDT. Trial use of ankle foot orthosis for foot clearance. Begin cognitive dual-task training during ambulation.
